sections.heading: Tax Administrator; certify distributed taxable value
sections.text: On or before August 10 of each year, the Property Tax Administrator shall certify the distributed taxable value of the property valued by the state, as equalized by the commission, to each county assessor.SourceLaws 1995, LB 452, § 16;Laws 1995, L

77-5030.Property Tax Administrator; certify distributed taxable value.

On or before August 10 of each year, the Property Tax Administrator shall certify the distributed taxable value of the property valued by the state, as equalized by the commission, to each county assessor.

SourceLaws 1995, LB 452, § 16;Laws 1995, LB 490, § 59;R.S.1943, (1996), § 77-509.02;Laws 1997, LB 397, § 48;Laws 1998, LB 306, § 41.
